SamPy.bolshoi.plotdarkmatterMF2Â¶

Plots a dark matter halo mass function at different redshifts. Input data are from the Bolshoi simulation.

author:Sami-Matias Niemi

Functions

plotMassFunction(simus, sheth, outdir, h, ...) This function plots dark matter halo mass functions from file(s) given in simus.
